column2: "prediction": "Researchers at the Francis Crick Institute have developed a method to analyze the past of a tumor and predict its future behavior. They studied the cases of kidney cancer and found that some tumors are \"born bad\" and grow aggressively
column3: while others remain benign and do not require treatment. This discovery could help improve cancer treatment by identifying which patients need to be treated and which can be monitored. The study analyzed tumor samples from 100 patients and"}
